JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Motivated employees for picking & packing tasks in Kolding
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you want to help make a difference with our customer in Kolding, and can you start with short notice? Then we have the job for you.

About the job

The company is an international freight forwarding company based in Kolding. You’ll become part of the department that deals with different web shops in different areas.

Your primary job at the warehouse will be to pick and pack items and brands. There may also be tasks handling the receiving/sorting the goods or the return department, so you’ll also get a workday full of variety.

You’ll become part of a social workplace that focuses on a healthy working environment and leaving better than you came.

Your profile

Experience with warehouse work is not a demand. You will receive the necessary training in picking and packing, sorting packages, and other relevant tasks within warehouse work.

You thrive with physical work and go to any task with a big smile, good energy, and high spirits. It is also important that you are a stable and dutiful employee, but we do not have to explain that to you. You are aware of that.

You will get to work with a lot of other people in an international environment, and therefore it is an advantage if you can communicate in English.

Work hours

We offer shifts from Monday to Friday from 07.00 – 15.00 or from 15.00 to 23.00. (sometime there is work on weekends but it is optional)

Please note in your application if you wish to work full- or part time.

Are you interested?

If the position, caught your attention, do not hesitate to send your application.

We regularly call for an interview.

We're looking forward to receiving your application!
